name: Abdul-Mussawir Aybak
story: Khairullah Kohzad grew up in a large family in a small village in rural Afghanistan. He was always fascinated by weapons, and spent much of his youth hunting with his father. When the war broke out in Afghanistan, Khairullah joined the Taliban, convinced that he was fighting for the right cause. As the years passed, however, he became disillusioned with the fighting and the endless violence, and eventually left the Taliban to join a private security company. Now, as a marksman for the OPFOR, Khairullah uses his skills to protect his new country and his family, but he still remembers his past and the choices he has made.
